hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh

Class AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexedTriangleMesh, IndexedTriangleStrip, PointList, TriangleMesh, TriangleStrip
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexedTriangleStripImpl

    public abstract class AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip
extends Object
implements IndexedTriangleStrip
    Abstract superclass for IndexedTriangleStrip objects implementing the IndexedTriangleMesh and the PointList aspects.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba
